con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="PessoaSOAPServiceImplService" targetNamespace="http://soap.webservices.piloto.fuse.portoconecta.com.br/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" name="describePessoaResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:InvalidPessoa" name="InvalidPessoa"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding
